name: Bundesliga Manager Professional
overview: You pick your favorite football (soccer) team and start from the lowest league in this game (3rd tier) to lead the team to glory & trophies. Bundesliga Manager Professional is a managerial simulator of soccer. The game simulates the German Bundesliga (first, second and third division) and the German league cup (DfB-Pokal). The teams and players have real names (season 1990). An English version was released named "The Manager". The game is the second installment in the series and the successor of "Bundesliga Manager".
